measure.CatchLine: Restricts methods by which lands zoned for farm, forest or mixed farm and forest use may be redesignated for nonresource use.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act limits rezoning of farm and forest lands. (Flesch Readability Score: 75.5). 
	Restricts methods by which lands zoned for farm, forest or mixed farm and forest use may be redesignated for nonresource use.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to redesignating resource lands for nonresource use; amending ORS 215.788.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to redesignating resource lands for nonresource use.
measure.AtTheRequestOf: (at the request of Senate Interim Committee on Natural Resources and Wildfire)
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

sponsors.PresessionFiledMessage: Printed pursuant to Senate Interim Rule 213.28 by order of the President of the Senate in conformance with presession filing rules, indicating neither advocacy nor opposition on the part of the President.

historyActions.ActionText: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Natural Resources and Wildfire.
